DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Catioprost® ( Unpreserved Latanoprost 0.005 % Emulsion ) Compared Travatan Z® Treat Glaucoma Ocular Surface Disease

Have document diagnosis ocular hypertension , open angle glaucoma ( without pseudoexfoliation pigment dispersion component ) chronic angle closure glaucoma patent iridotomy require treatment ocular hypertensive therapy study eye . Female subject childbearing potential hysterectomy , bilateral oophorectomy , bilateral tubal ligation , postmenopausal least 12 month . Have prior ( within 30 day Visit 1 ) anticipate concurrent use investigational drug device study period .
